test.subject: english
test.name: Tiếng Anh 12 - Unit 9: Choosing a Career
test.description: Chủ đề Lựa chọn nghề nghiệp. Ngữ pháp: Cụm động từ (Phrasal Verbs) và Mệnh đề nhượng bộ (Adverbial clauses of concession).

questions.question: Mark the letter A, B, C, or D to indicate the word whose underlined part differs from the other three in pronunciation.
questions.explanation: Đáp án A 'career' phần 'a' đọc là /ə/. 'Carry' và 'academic' là /æ/. 'Apply' là /ə/ nhưng trọng âm khác. Tuy nhiên câu này kiểm tra âm 'a'. 'Career' /kəˈrɪər/, 'Academic' /ˌæk.əˈdem.ɪk/.

questions.question: Mark the letter A, B, C, or D to indicate the word that differs from the other three in the position of primary stress.
questions.explanation: Đáp án D 'secondary' nhấn âm 1. Các từ còn lại nhấn âm trước đuôi -tion/-al (âm 2 hoặc 3).

questions.question: Many students choose ______ education instead of going to university.
questions.explanation: 'Vocational education' (giáo dục nghề nghiệp/học nghề).

questions.question: You should ______ more information about the course before enrolling.
questions.explanation: 'Look for' (tìm kiếm).

questions.question: ______ he studied hard, he failed the exam.
questions.explanation: Mệnh đề nhượng bộ có chủ ngữ + động từ (he studied hard) dùng 'Although'.

questions.question: ______ his lack of experience, he got the job.
questions.explanation: Sau chỗ trống là cụm danh từ 'his lack of experience', dùng 'In spite of' hoặc 'Despite'.

questions.question: My parents want me to ______ a career in medicine.
questions.explanation: 'Pursue a career' (theo đuổi một sự nghiệp).

questions.question: If you are not sure what to do, you can ask a career ______ for advice.
questions.explanation: 'Career adviser' (cố vấn nghề nghiệp).

questions.question: Closest meaning: Don't 'give up' even if it gets difficult.
questions.explanation: 'Give up' (từ bỏ) đồng nghĩa với 'stop' (dừng lại/bỏ cuộc).

questions.question: Opposite meaning: The job offers a 'stable' income.
questions.explanation: 'Stable' (ổn định) trái nghĩa với 'temporary' (tạm thời/không ổn định).

questions.question: He turned ______ the job offer because the salary was too low.
questions.explanation: 'Turn down' (từ chối).

questions.question: She managed to finish the project ______ she was ill.
questions.explanation: Sau chỗ trống là mệnh đề 'she was ill', dùng 'even though'.

questions.question: An ______ allows you to learn a trade while working.
questions.explanation: 'Apprenticeship' (thời gian học việc/công tác thực tập sinh).

questions.question: You need to ______ the application form and send it by post.
questions.explanation: 'Fill in/Fill out' (điền vào mẫu đơn).

questions.question: Communication: 'I'm thinking of becoming a teacher.' - '______'

options.text: I think you'd make a great one.

questions.explanation: Lời động viên và nhận xét tích cực phù hợp nhất.

questions.question: Identify mistake: 'Despite he was tired, he continued working.'
questions.explanation: 'Despite' không đi với mệnh đề. Phải sửa thành 'Although' hoặc 'Despite being tired'.

questions.question: Doing a ______ job can help you decide if you like the career.
questions.explanation: 'Part-time job' (việc làm thêm) giúp trải nghiệm thử.

questions.question: He ______ working even though he is 65.
questions.explanation: 'Go on' (tiếp tục).

questions.question: Transformation: 'Although it was raining heavily, they went out.' -> 'Despite...'

options.text: Despite the heavy rain, they went out.
Despite it was raining heavily, they went out.
Despite the rain was heavy, they went out.
Despite of the heavy rain, they went out.

questions.explanation: Chuyển mệnh đề 'it was raining heavily' thành cụm danh từ 'the heavy rain'.

questions.question: Some people take a ______ year before going to university.
questions.explanation: 'Gap year' (năm nghỉ ngắt quãng để trải nghiệm).
